item.title: EXCLUSIVE: JD Vance FIRST Post-Debate Interview
item.itunes:title: EXCLUSIVE: JD Vance FIRST Post-Debate Interview
item.description:
On this special edition of Ruthless, JD Vance joins the fellas to recap his stellar performance in the recent Vice Presidential debate. In his first sit-down interview since the showdown with Tim Walz, Vance breaks down his internal dialogue during the debate, discusses the dynamics behind his winning strategy, and addresses his viral “Jim from the Office” moment.

 

A Collaboration with the Safari Club International.

For over 50 years, Safari Club International (SCI) has been the leader in defending the freedom to hunt and promoting wildlife conservation worldwide. SCI is unique in the scope of our ability to defend and advance our freedom to hunt. SCI is the only hunting rights organization with a Washington, D.C. based national and international advocacy team and an all-species focus. SCI also mobilizes more than 150 chapters and affiliate networks representing millions of hunters around the world. 

Learn more about SCI here: https://safariclub.org (https://safariclub.org/)

item.description:
In this episode of Ruthless, the fellas tackle the hurricane that has devastated Florida, Georgia, South and North Carolina. This tragic event has claimed the lives of many and has left many more stranded without water, food, electricity, or shelter. For the first few days of the crisis, where was Biden? Where was Kamala? At the beach and fundraising with wealthy donors, respectively. 

The VP debate is tonight, what are the dynamics? What does JD Vance need to do to beat Tim Walz? The fellas break it down.

Stay tuned for a surprise story in variety that gives the fellas, for lack of a better term, a bad trip. Lastly, good friend of the Progrum FEC Chairman Sean Cooksey joins the show!

item.title: Trump’s Winning Debate Strategy
item.itunes:title: Trump’s Winning Debate Strategy
item.description:
On this episode of Ruthless, the fellas bring you a pre-debate special! Today is the day Trump and Kamala face off in their first presidential debate. What are the stakes? What strategies should he use to wipe the floor on the debate stage? How will the rules affect the conduct of the debate? The show highlights the immense weaknesses Kamala will have to overcome in this debate, from her pivotal role in a very unpopular incumbent administration to her multiple tie-breaking votes in legislation that had disastrous economic consequences and her role in foreign policy catastrophes such as the devastating Afghanistan withdrawal. The fellas break it down with highlighted clips and more in this episode. 

The show also discusses the recently published debate rules and how these new developments will impact the debate landscape. Can Kamala have her trademark "I'm speaking" interruption? Will the candidates be able to talk to each other? Will there be a chance for a back-and-forth between the candidates? All of which will be discussed on the progrum and more.

Keep watching for the long-awaited return of the minion favorite game of King Of The Hill. Who will come out on top? Who will prevail? Stick around to find out.

item.title: How A Kamala Recession Shakes Up The Election
item.itunes:title: How A Kamala Recession Shakes Up The Election
item.description:
In this episode, the fellas kick things off with the state of the economy. Despite media claims of a robust economy, Smug explains how underlying indicators tell a different story. Companies are laying off thousands of employees, and quarterly numbers are being revised down. They analyze how this disconnect affects public perception and the potential political fallout.

Smug, the finance expert, breaks down the difference between stock market performance and the actual economy. He points out how recent layoffs and revised job numbers reflect deeper economic issues, despite the stock market’s previous gains driven by tech stocks and AI breakthroughs. The fellas discuss how recent market corrections might signal a return to rational behavior and what that means for investors.

The fellas also touch on the latest political developments, including Kamala Harris’s selection of a vice-presidential candidate and the markets’ reaction to the current administration’s policies. Amidst economic turmoil, they scrutinize the Biden-Harris administration’s handling of the situation and its impact on their re-election prospects.

In a lighter segment, the fellas cover some intriguing animal news and a curious story involving RFK Jr. and a bear.

Check out this great new site from our sponsor Americans for Prosperity: securebordersecureamerica.com  

TAKE ACTION! Tell Congress to guard your card and visit GaurdYourCard.com.

The fellas discuss how recent market corrections might signal a return to rational behavior and what that means for investors.

The fellas also touch on the latest political developments, including Kamala Harris’s selection of a vice-presidential candidate and the markets’ reaction to the current administration’s policies. Amidst economic turmoil, they scrutinize the Biden-Harris administration’s handling of the situation and its impact on their re-election prospects.

In a lighter segment, the fellas cover some intriguing animal news and a curious story involving RFK Jr. and a bear.

item.title: This Is Why Biden Finally Quit
item.itunes:title: This Is Why Biden Finally Quit
item.description:
On this episode of Ruthless, Joe Biden has officially announced he's not running for re-election, a decision that took many by surprise. The fellas dive into the details, discussing the internal polls, fundraising woes, and key meetings that led to this historic announcement. And what about Kamala Harris? With endorsements rolling in, she's now the Democratic standard-bearer. But what does this mean for the future of the Democratic Party?

The fellas also explore the unusual dynamics within the White House, the role of Jill Biden, and the bizarre set of circumstances surrounding Biden's announcement. Plus, the political fallout and the conspiracy theories that have emerged in the wake of Biden's decision can't be ignored.

item.title: This Is Why The Media Is Suddenly Attacking Biden
item.itunes:title: This Is Why The Media Is Suddenly Attacking Biden
item.description:
On this episode of Ruthless the Republican National Convention is just one week away, while the Democrats are still in disarray, uncertain about their candidate. The country is in uncharted territory, the Democrats are in chaos, and the fellas are ecstatic.

Today's episode has a lot to cover, starting with a hilarious and bewildering clip from Joe Biden. During a speech, he left everyone scratching their heads with a completely unrelated comment about the overflow room. The fellas will unpack that and more as they dive into the Democratic nominee's latest antics.

The Democratic nominee, who happens to be the current President, is struggling to regain his footing after a disastrous debate performance. He’s trying to project high energy on the campaign trail, but it’s proving to be quite a challenge. His attempt to reassure Democratic governors that he can still campaign despite his brain issues didn't exactly instill confidence. The fellas share some clips to illustrate just how off the rails things have gone.

The Democratic donor class and major party figures are in a frenzy. The pressure is mounting, with big names expressing concern. It's clear that the party is deeply divided and unsure about Biden’s chances moving forward.

Check out this great new site from our sponsor Americans for Prosperity: securebordersecureamerica.com

item.title: Democrats’ Strategy To Remove Biden
item.itunes:title: Democrats’ Strategy To Remove Biden
item.description:
On this episode of Ruthless, this week, amidst a black swan media event, the fellas are delivering fresh content and crucial updates.

Concerns about Biden’s debate performance are being dismissed by many Democrats. However, this story has gained significant traction, making it to mainstream media outlets which discussed Biden’s cognitive decline and debate performance days later.

The Democrats are struggling to navigate this situation, unlike Republicans who deal with an adversarial media regularly. The shift in momentum suggests internal conflicts about Biden’s nomination. Notably, Nancy Pelosi’s inability to defend Biden convincingly hints at deeper issues.

Amidst this, the fellas discuss the strategy if Democrats move on from Biden and the potential impact of Kamala Harris as a candidate. Harris’s candidacy is being considered despite her previous struggles in the 2020 race. The idea of Harris stepping in is surprising, considering the historical context with Hillary Clinton.

Democratic politics remain dynamic, and Harris’s potential candidacy underscores the party’s challenges. This highlights the dilemma within the party, weighing Biden’s troubled candidacy against the risks of switching to Harris.

CNN polls show Harris outperforming Biden in some demographics, yet these numbers should be approached with caution. Despite challenges, Harris has access to significant resources, which could ease a potential transition. Biden’s family urging him to stay in the race adds another layer to the ongoing debate.

As this story develops, the decisions made in the coming days will shape the future of the Democratic Party. Stay tuned for more insights and updates on this evolving situation.

 

Check out this great new site from our sponsor Americans for Prosperity: securebordersecureamerica.com

item.title: It’s Worse Than You Think For Biden
item.itunes:title: It’s Worse Than You Think For Biden
item.description:
On today's episode of Ruthless, after days of analysis, reporting, and leaks, the fellas are ready to break it all down. This episode is all about savoring the fallout and examining the juicy details that emerged post-debate.
The show kicks things off by discussing a particularly memorable exchange between the candidates. This debate provided plenty of fodder, and the progrum is going to enjoy every bit of it. From the humorous to the absurd, this episode covers the highlights, starting with an intriguing clip that set the tone for the rest of the show.
One of the standout moments was Biden's attempt to challenge Trump to a one on one contest of golf. It was a surprising turn of events and sparked a lot of conversation. The fellas dissect this moment and share their thoughts on what it reveals about the candidates. The debate showcased some classic Biden moments, and they'll analyze his performance and the broader implications.
But that's not all. The fallout from the debate has been significant, with Democrats in disarray and key figures calling for Biden to step aside. The fellas explore the media's reaction, the internal Democratic Party turmoil, and the broader political implications. This debate has shifted the landscape, and how it could shape the future of the presidential race will be discussed. In addition to the debate analysis, the fellas touch on the recent SCOTUS immunity case and its implications. Plus, they'll delve into some lighter topics, including the latest trends in in-flight entertainment (or lack thereof) and a variety of other interesting tidbits.

item.title: Trump V Biden: Winning Strategy
item.itunes:title: Trump V Biden: Winning Strategy
item.description:
On this episode of Ruthless, the show kicks off with pre-debate analysis. With Donald Trump and Joe Biden facing off for the first time, the show dives into the strategies and stakes at play. The fellas discuss why Biden can't win but can force Trump to lose and how Biden's team might have underestimated Trump's willingness to accept any terms.

As the first debate of the 2024 election season, the stakes are incredibly high for both candidates. Biden needs this debate more than Trump, aiming to silence critics and prove his capability amidst ongoing doubts. Conversely, Trump's challenge is to stay focused and avoid falling into traps set by Biden's team.

The fellas also discuss the unique debate format and rules, including two commercial breaks, no opening statements, and no studio audience. The fellas explain the agreed-upon structure, including time allocations for responses and rebuttals, and the strategic choices made by both campaigns regarding podium positions and closing statements.

In other news, has science gone too far? The fellas discuss. King of the Hill makes a return with a shocking twist.

Finally, Riley Gaines joins the progrum to discuss her new book "Swimming Against the Current: Fighting for Common Sense in a World That’s Lost its Mind."

 

Check out this great new site from our sponsor Americans for Prosperity: securebordersecureamerica.com

item.title: Trump Picks His VP
item.itunes:title: Trump Picks His VP
item.description:
Today's episode of Ruthless kicks off with a hilarious clip from a recent Democratic gathering. The speech, filled with repetitive and vague statements, showcases the rhetoric people are used to hearing. We dissect the lack of substance and the audience's lukewarm response. This leads into a broader conversation about the current state of the presidential election cycle, particularly focusing on President Trump's VP pick, which could be one of the most consequential choices in recent history.
The fellas explore the potential candidates. From the seasoned senator to the rising star, they debate who would best complement Trump and why this choice is more crucial than ever, given the concerns about Joe Biden's ability to serve a second term. The hosts discuss the merits of various contenders, including JD Vance, Doug Burgum, and Marco Rubio, weighing their backgrounds and what they bring to the table.
In other news, this episode examines the Biden campaign's trailing fundraising efforts compared to Trump's and what this means for the election.
Lastly, the progrum has a special guest, Sarah Gabel Seifert, who is at the forefront of bringing conservative values back into the business world. She'll discuss the parallel economy and how conservatives can align their spending with their values.

item.title: Is This The Worst Political Strategy Ever?
item.itunes:title: Is This The Worst Political Strategy Ever?
item.description:
On this episode of Ruthless, the fellas delve into the most pressing issues of our time, offering sharp insights and robust discussions. Join the hosts as they dissect the latest developments in immigration, media bias, and political maneuvers shaping today's headlines.

They start by examining President Biden's controversial amnesty plan, which has shielded over 550,000 immigrants from deportation. Amidst a backdrop of border crises and political tensions, the hosts critically analyze the implications and public reaction to this sweeping election year action.

Moving forward, the discussion shifts to the intricate dynamics of media bias and its profound impact on public perception. From dissecting biased narratives to questioning journalistic integrity, they explore how media narratives shape public opinion and influence political discourse.

Finally, Ralph Reed, from the faith and freedom coalition, joins the progrum to talk about their upcoming road to majority conference.

Throughout the episode, the hosts bring their trademark insightful and sometimes irreverent perspectives to bear on these critical issues. Their candid conversations provide a unique blend of analysis and commentary, offering viewers a deeper understanding of the complexities at play.

item.title: Voters Are Shifting, But Who Does It Benefit?
item.itunes:title: Voters Are Shifting, But Who Does It Benefit?
item.description:
On this episode of Ruthless, the fellas dive into the latest gaffe from President Joe Biden. It seems he’s having trouble getting from point A to point B and forming coherent sentences. The Democrats had to bring in the big guns – former President Obama – to try to save the day. It’s not a great look when the previous president appears more alert than the current one. This clip sparked a lot of reactions, and the fellas break down why it’s such a significant moment.

Next, the fellas discuss a critical shift in American politics. Will a high-turnout environment in the presidential election actually help Republicans over Democrats? Recent cycles suggest this might be the case. The hosts analyze the data and what it means for the upcoming elections.

Plus, the fellas will touch on Chuck Schumer’s Twitter fiasco, where he got cyber-bullied into deleting a tweet about his poorly cooked hamburger on Father’s Day. It’s a funny story you won’t want to miss. The Progrum is excited to have a special guest on today’s show – Sam Brown, a US Senate candidate from Nevada. He has an incredible story that is both inspiring and compelling.

Visit ElectronicPaymentsCoalition.org and tell your Senators to oppose the Durbin-Marshall credit card bill.

item.title: Why Are Joe's Poll Numbers Tanking??
item.itunes:title: Why Are Joe's Poll Numbers Tanking??
item.description:
In this episode, the fellas kick things off with a more serious topic: the recent rescue of hostages from Hamas. The hosts celebrate this significant achievement and discuss the media’s controversial response. They provide a deep dive into the biased coverage of Israel and Gaza, shedding light on the role of “journalists” with ulterior motives and how their activism influences public perception.

As the episode moves forward, the fellas tackle the topic of President Biden’s dismal approval ratings. They analyze the latest polls, explore what these numbers mean for his administration, and speculate on the potential impact on upcoming elections. It’s a comprehensive discussion that offers both context and predictions for the future.

The show is thrilled to welcome back special guest Mary Katharine Ham, who brings her unique perspective to the show. Her insights and commentary add an extra layer of depth to our discussions, making this episode even more enriching.

Stay tuned for all this and more in this jam-packed episode of the Ruthless Variety Progrum!

item.title: Ben Shapiro Gets Ruthless
item.itunes:title: Ben Shapiro Gets Ruthless
item.description:
Today, Ben Shapiro joins the progrum. Ben shares his thoughts on staying out of D.C. and his lack of enthusiasm for the town, comparing it to Joe Biden's electoral base. It's a low bar, and Ben doesn't hold back.
The fellas dive into the Wall Street Journal's headline about Biden, discussing how it feels like breaking news despite being common knowledge—the media's portrayal of Biden and the absurdity of studies that state the obvious come under fire. Ben and the crew joke about the president's condition, drawing a sharp contrast between public perception and media reports.
The conversation takes a serious turn as the hosts discuss the cognitive decline of Biden and the media's efforts to shield him. Ben highlights how the media has run interference for Biden, citing examples from various news outlets. The team dissects Biden's recent interviews and public appearances, showcasing moments of confusion and missteps that raise questions about his fitness for office.
Ben shares his views on the critiques of Biden from both sides of the aisle, emphasizing the bipartisan agreement on his shortcomings. The discussion shifts to Hunter Biden's controversial texts and the portrayal of Jill Biden.
The fellas delve into the Wall Street Journal's revelations about the White House's monitoring of interviews and the influence on Democrat members of Congress. The team discusses the parallels between Biden's staff and attending nurses at a care facility, painting a vivid picture of the administration's handling of the president.
The foreign policy blunders under Biden come under scrutiny, with the fellas expressing astonishment at the drastic shifts and ongoing crises. He contrasts Biden's approach with Trump's, praising the unpredictability and fear Trump instilled in global politics. The conversation touches on the implications of Biden's policies on international relations, especially concerning China and Taiwan.
Stay tuned for more engaging discussions and sharp insights with the Ruthless Variety progrum!

 

Visit ElectronicPaymentsCoalition.org and tell your Senators to oppose the Durbin-Marshall credit card bill.

Check out this great new site from our sponsor Americans for Prosperity: securebordersecureamerica.com

item.title: Is The Trump Verdict Backfiring?
item.itunes:title: Is The Trump Verdict Backfiring?
item.description:
In this episode, the fellas dive into a hilarious yet insightful discussion on the latest trending national news and Republican politics. The progrum starts with a disturbing reaction from President Joe Biden to a question about Donald Trump, leading to some laugh-out-loud commentary from the team.

The conversation then shifts to the broader implications of recent political events, including the country's reaction to Trump's legal troubles and the apparent collusion in the DOJ. The fellas don't hold back in their analysis, providing a mix of sharp wit and serious critique on the state of the Biden administration and its impact on national politics.

The fellas also cover the trending Trump indictment and conviction, discussing the legal and political ramifications. From the media's portrayal to the actual legal merits (or lack thereof) the hosts dissect the situation with their signature blend of humor and insight. They explore the broader narrative, including the weaponization of the legal system against political opponents and the double standards in campaign finance violations.

Moreover, the hosts delve into the Republican Party's response and unity in the face of these challenges, drawing parallels to past events. The discussion is rich with perspectives on the media's role, voter sentiment, and the strategic moves within the GOP.

Don't miss out on this engaging and thought-provoking episode.

 

 

Visit ElectronicPaymentsCoalition.org and tell your Senators to oppose the Durbin-Marshall credit card bill.

item.title: Trump: Guilty Or Not Guilty?
item.itunes:title: Trump: Guilty Or Not Guilty?
item.description:
Welcome back to Ruthless! This Thursday's episode is jam packed, featuring our full cast, including McDaniel, delivering some 🔥 legal analysis. This week, the spotlight is on law and order, and Ruthless has the inside scoop. Today, the show kick things off with a viral clip from a Biden campaign press conference that had everyone talking.

Get the lowdown on Robert De Niro's surprising foray into politics and why it's causing a stir. From epic ad-lib fails to the pitfalls of celebrity endorsements, this episode dives deep into the drama.

Stay tuned as the fellas unravel the latest developments in the Trump trial saga. From the courtroom drama to the Democrats' nail-biting anticipation, the hosts are dissecting every twist and turn. Find out why Democrats are sweating over Biden's prospects and how it's sending shockwaves through the political landscape. 

Don't miss the guest segment with Tyrus, as he details his extraordinary career in wrestling and media.

item.title: It Just Got Worse For Biden
item.itunes:title: It Just Got Worse For Biden
item.description:
Welcome back to the Ruthless Variety Program! In this episode, the fellas discuss a tough week for Joe Biden, featuring some head-scratching moments and fumbles that left everyone stunned. From confusing timelines to introducing hostages who weren't there, they dissect the highlights (and lowlights) of Biden's recent speeches.

The fellas share their candid reactions and fiery opinions on the administration's handling of various issues, including foreign policy blunders and misleading headlines. Plus, they explore the mind-boggling corrections needed for Biden's speeches, courtesy of the ever-busy "Bracket Man" at the White House.

Don't miss the guest segment with Allison Esposito, a Congressional candidate from New York, as she discusses the critical race and her vision for the future. Tune in for King of the Hill, hilarious clips, and much more on this episode of the Ruthless Variety Progrum!

item.title: Indy 500 - Jim Banks, Al Unser Jr.
item.itunes:title: Indy 500 - Jim Banks, Al Unser Jr.
item.description:
Welcome back to the Ruthless Variety Program! In this special episode, Michael Duncan, Comfortably Smug, and John Ashbrook take you behind the scenes at the Indy 500. They explore the vibrant atmosphere that makes this race more than just a sporting event – it's a celebration of community, patriotism, and American spirit.

But it's not just about the race. The show has an exciting lineup of guests, including Congressman Jim Banks, who's running for Senate, and the legendary Al Unser Jr., a two-time Indy 500 winner. The episode delves into their experiences, insights, and what makes the Indianapolis 500 so special.

Beyond the track, they tackle the latest news and pressing issues. From the intricate details of inflation and its impact on American households to the dramatic recent developments in Iran's political landscape, we cover it all. The fellas break down the critical news stories you need to know, providing thoughtful analysis and spirited discussion.

item.description:
Welcome back to the Ruthless Variety progrum! In this episode, dive headfirst into the latest political controversies, starting with the rampant racism from the Democratic Party. The Fellas dissect the outrageous comments from NYC Mayor Eric Adams and NY Governor Kathy Hochul, highlighting the media's double standards and lack of accountability.

Prepare for a fiery discussion as the fellas critique these statements and their implications, questioning the absence of national backlash that would be inevitable if such comments came from a Republican. The Democrats' negligence towards minority communities is also explored, emphasizing how they take their votes for granted and the rising discontent among these groups.

Next, shift gears to the breaking news of the first presidential debate between Joe Biden and Donald Trump, scheduled for June 27th on CNN. The fellas analyze the strategic implications of this early showdown, Biden's desperation to prove his fitness for office, and the expectations for both candidates. What does this mean for the 2024 election? And why is the debate happening so soon? Ruthless has all the insights.

Stay tuned as the progrum welcomes Senator Joni Ernst, fresh from her trip to Israel, to discuss her perspectives on the Democratic Party's domestic and foreign policy blunders. Plus, a fascinating segment on the latest whale news - it's been a while since we talked about blowholes! Join us for an action-packed episode filled with sharp analysis, unfiltered opinions, and a healthy dose of humor.

item.title: Who Is Winning The Presidential Race?
item.itunes:title: Who Is Winning The Presidential Race?
item.description:
In this episode, the fellas kick things off with a deep dive into a delicious treat for political enthusiasts: James Carville's latest commentary. Known as the architect of the Clinton '92 campaign, Carville's recent remarks are causing waves. He’s not holding back, claiming that what the Democrats are doing simply isn’t working. They break down Carville's blunt assessment and discuss its implications for the Democratic Party, highlighting the growing gap between traditional Democratic strategies and modern party dynamics.

As the political landscape heats up earlier than usual, the fellas explore the shifting focus from legislative activities to intense political reporting and general election preparations. With elections looming, everything is under the microscope until November.

They also bring you the latest election analysis, including the New York Times/Siena poll showing significant movement towards Trump in key swing states. What does this mean for the Democrats? The potential impact is discussed, and what strategies might be needed to change course.

The featured guest today is Brody Mullins, a journalist who dives into the influence-peddling industry in his new book, "The Wolves of K Street." Hear about his journey and insights as he tackles the swamp, offering a fresh perspective on the inner workings of Washington.

item.description:
In this episode of the Ruthless Variety Program, the fellas dive into a bizarre yet fascinating tale. RFK has brain worms—yes, brain worms! This strange phenomenon allegedly caused severe memory loss and mental fogginess, sparking a series of surprising medical investigations. We dissect this wild story with the signature mix of deep analysis and humorous commentary, offering insights that are as informative as they are entertaining.

Plus, don't miss an in-depth conversation with Larry O'Connor from WMAL and Town Hall. Ashbrook sits down with Larry to discuss his transition from Andrew Breitbart’s Big Hollywood to becoming a well-known voice in conservative media. Larry shares valuable insights into the challenges and transformations within the media industry, reflecting on his experiences and the evolving dynamics of media and politics. 

With thoughtful analysis, engaging stories, and witty dialogue, this episode provides essential insights for anyone interested in media, politics, or the strange intersections of health and public figures. Plus, we examine the role of international actors and the Biden administration's handling of the crisis. Hit play now and stay informed.Plus, dive into a lively discussion about the evolving landscape of media and politics with this must-watch interview featuring Will Cain! The fellas sit down with Will Cain to explore his journey from sports media to political commentary, offering insights into the inner workings of the media industry and where it's headed next.
In this engaging conversation, Will shares candid reflections on his career path, from his early ventures in newspaper entrepreneurship to his transition into television and radio. He provides intriguing anecdotes about his experiences at major media outlets like CNN and ESPN, shedding light on the intersection of sports, politics, and culture.
The discussion delves into pressing issues such as media polarization, audience engagement, and the impact of social media on content creation. Will offers astute observations on the challenges and opportunities facing both traditional media giants and emerging digital platforms, highlighting the importance of authenticity and quality in a landscape saturated with clickbait and sensationalism.
With thoughtful analysis and witty banter, this interview offers valuable insights for media enthusiasts, aspiring journalists, and anyone interested in the dynamic intersection of media and politics. item.title: Episode 2 - EMERGENCY DEBATE POD
item.itunes:title: Episode 2 - EMERGENCY DEBATE POD

item.itunes:subtitle: In this preview episode, Josh and Comfortably Smug discuss the history of Supreme Court confirmations, as well as other important matters of the day like court packing and Jeffrey Toobin. Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to Ruthless.

item.itunes:subtitle: Smug and Holmes bring next generation conservative talk to the next level with RUTHLESS. There is no shelter for anyone as the duo provide a lighter analysis of the news (and fake news) of the day.
